text: Canis Majoris can refer to any of a number of stars which, as seen from Earth, reside within the Canis Major constellation, including: * Sirius (Alpha Canis Majoris), the brightest star in the terrestrial sky * VY Canis Majoris, one of the largest known stars in the known universe * Murzim (Beta Canis Majoris) * Muliphen (Gamma CMa) * Wezen (Delta CMa) * Adara (Epsilon CMa) * Furud (Zeta CMa) * Aludra (Eta CMa).
title: Canis Majoris
